website_summaries.verdict: Unique product is a styling gel and black hair dye product in one. Designed to cover up gray hair.
pros: Barber and hairdresser recommended for covering up graying hair
Washes off easily in the shower
Doesn't stain clothes or leave residue
Suitable for all hair types and lengths
cons: Not a general use styling gel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well My sides are cut short and it doesn't "darken them" enough but it works well on the top
customer_reviews.author: Bill Furman

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Great if you want to cover some ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Great if you want to cover some gray quickly while using gel. I already use gel so I use it on the area that I want to cover some gray.
customer_reviews.author: Haythem

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as described, younger looking beard for gray hair. I'll be ordering Blackgel again, Thanks! I've been asked to reassert my positive opinion for this product, it is 5-star, People have commented on how good my beard looks, now if it was gray I don't think the reaction would be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does NOT cover gray hair
customer_reviews.text: doesn't cover no gray no orang no shi ttt , it's very basic hair gel,,they just make the gel color darker.. it's cheap quality and doesn't worth $2.99
customer_reviews.author: aland haddad

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff Lasts all day Very low key not noticeable Excellent product my wife uses it to cover roots growing out lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Does not really darken or thicken as well as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not really darken or thicken as well as I had hoped. But, I do use as it helps a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gel, not too thick and easy to apply. I will definitely buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Blackgel for grey hair
customer_reviews.text: No good for grey why u say it for grey hair is because you want your product to sell
customer_reviews.author: Athems of the seas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: I have used the gel for 10 days now and have to this is a great product. Covers grey uniformly and does not stain face, scalp or hands. The hold is great without flaky stiffness. Finally I have not noticed any purple/blue hints of color. I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t last, and you need to use a lot of it to cover up.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all... I am thinking ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all ... I am thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TNguyen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine as a gel, but didn't color the hair of my beard very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!  👏
customer_reviews.text: This gel works as advertised! To bad it's not available on Amazon anymore! 😭
customer_reviews.author: Juan Colon

customer_reviews.title: Wet Goop.
customer_reviews.text: This is Absolutely the WORST hair coloring product ever ! Dosent COVER OR COLOR ...just Wet TRANSPARENT GEL . SAVE YOUR MONEY !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I have light brown hair, and I bought this for my hair as part of my Superman costume. It makes your hair darker just a little bit. Does not "dye" your hair black. However, it does hold your hair really well when you style it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Useless?
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Applied decent amount but nothing happened. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: francisco brambilla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product . Really blacken my grays as much as 70-80 percent and hair stays in place for the entire day Z . Washes off easily upon shower and barely smudges the pillows
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not sticky, hair feels natural
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, hair looks and feels natural. Not messy at all after applied to hair, doesn't easily rub off.
customer_reviews.author: turbo6

customer_reviews.title: The color works good. The gel itself has no shine to it ...
customer_reviews.text: The color works good. The gel itself has no shine to it and does not hold too good, but overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Yoga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received on time as advertised, and it works great. "Five Stars" from me.
customer_reviews.author: WiseMan25

customer_reviews.title: other similar items go for only $8 to $9 and quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: There other products that cost less. I would order it again if price dropped 5 dollars; other similar items go for only $8 to $9 and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: The header says alcohol-free but...
customer_reviews.text: If you read the ingredients it clearly lists metoxy isopropanol, which is rubbing alcohol, and methylparaben. This product is not good for your hair and, more importantly, it is not safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Blackgel - Best Styling & Gray Hair Coverage for Men, Gives Shiny, Intense Touch of Color, with Firm Hold for Hairstyles, Use like a Pomade, Alcohol Free Temporary Dye and Washes Out, 3.38 oz
product_meta.description: Look years younger with one easy application to cover and blacken your gray and white hairs. Texture and style your hair with this firm holding gel and watch those grays & whites disappear. For best results use on short salt & pepper colored hair. One application lasts all day and easily washes out with shampoo. Get yours today, and consider getting 2 - one for home and one for the office!
feature_bullets: Barber & Hairdresser Recommended to make you look years younger by covering that Salt & Pepper (gray hair) look.
Its a styling gel and black hair dye in one. No long tiresome treatments at the salon, just simply apply and leave on to temporarily cover those white or yellowing hairs.
One application lasts all day, and washes off in the shower! Doesn't stain clothes or leave a residue.
Great grooming product, suitable for all hair types and lengths, even suitable to use on your graying beard
Satisfaction Guaranteed, however if you aren't satisfied, simply return our Black Hair Gel within 30 days for a full refund.
